remove-pauses.name: Remove pauses from Playtime
remove-pauses.description: If enabled, removes the time you spend in the pause menu from your playtime. This also removes the time you spend at the 'Level Complete' screen

short-text.name: Use short playtime text
short-text.description: If enabled, uses a short version of the playtime, e.g. Xd Xh Xm Xs. When disabled, writes out the formats, e.g. X Days, X Hours, X Minutes, X Seconds.

highest-convert.name: Convert playtime up to
highest-convert.description: Whenever you check your playtime, the mod will convert it up to the selected unit, e.g. if you select "Hours", you will see your playtime converted to hours, minutes and seconds whereas if you select "Days", you get your playtime converted to days, hours, minutes and seconds.

infoLayer-position.name: Menu button position
infoLayer-position.description: Decide if the button on the level info page should appear above the favorites or on the left side of the screen.

issues.info: Please report any bugs/crashes etc. on the repository with an issue! Additionally, you can send me a dm on discord: @nanewtech
